attributes.action: Change and Stop discriminated against hidden disability
attributes.additional_details: To make those who are vulnerable and with all disability , Does Matter.We have equaled right, Can the government change their laws, We are getting discriminated so much, our mental health matters. Can the government stop discriminated those with a hidden disability.
attributes.background: We are getting discriminated and took advantage, Those with hidden disability,  We shouldn’t matter. Law of government, NOT to stop blue badges behind their hidden disability.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to discriminate against someone on the grounds of disability, whether or not they are visible. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
